title: (x) Walbaum Condensed? - Walburn {Rick (self)}
content:
This is an odd one! I know the font I am looking for is probably called Walbaum Condensed.

Does anybody know a vendor and who designed it? Does anybody know of good substitute?

Cheers!

 [‹ (x) Harley Davidson logo - custom designed (similar to RR Railroad Gothic or RR Block Gothic) {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006091406/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13275 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Galgeberg - Frutiger {Nicolai} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006091406/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13305 "Go to next forum topic")
author: maxhc

comments.content: Well wouldn’t you believe it?! I found it myself! It’s called Walburn by Agfa-Monotype!

Walburn was designed by Nick Shinn, a frequent contributor to Typophile. In addition to Fonts.com (Agfa-Monotype), it’s available from MyFonts, FontHaus, FontShop, etc.

[http://www.shinntype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006091406/http:/www.shinntype.com/ "http://www.shinntype.com/")
Thanks marc. Yeah, Walburn is definitely not “by” Monotype, just available through them among others.
